TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed NamespaceCollection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection
Public NotInheritable Class NamespaceCollection Inherits ConfigurationElementCollection

summary.span: 包含命名空间对象的集合。

span.span: Contains a collection of namespace objects.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含对象。The contains objects. 每个对象等同于`Import`(`<%@ Import %>`) 应用于所有页面和控件的配置文件的作用域中的指令。Each object is the same as an `Import` (`<%@ Import %>`) directive that applies to all pages and controls in the scope of the configuration file. `Import`指令允许你将命名空间导入你的 ASP.NET 页上，打开你页上进行所有类可供使用。The `Import` directive allows you to import a namespace into your ASP.NET page, making all its classes available for use on your page. ## Examples 下面的配置文件摘录演示如何以声明方式指定的多个属性的值类。The following configuration file excerpt shows how to declaratively specify values for several properties of the class. ``` ``` 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类型。The following code example shows how to use the type. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定是否可以导入 Visual Basic 命名空间而无需指定它。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether the Visual Basic namespace is imported without having to specify it.

value.span: 如果自动导入 Visual Basic 命名空间，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the Visual Basic namespace is imported automatically; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 Visual Basic 编写的 ASP.NET 页面命名空间会自动导入的除非属性是`false`。For ASP.NET pages written using Visual Basic the namespace is automatically imported unless the property is `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Clear() cil managed

summary.span: 从集合中删除所有 对象。

span.span: Removes all objects from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可清空集合并将插入`clear`元素插入配置文件，以删除对和当前的配置文件中更高级别的配置文件定义的元素的所有引用的相应节。This method empties the collection and inserts a `clear` element into the appropriate section of the configuration file to remove all references to elements defined in higher-level configuration files and in the current configuration file. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性将会覆盖对象已存在的指定索引处的情况; 否则为创建新对象并将添加到集合。This property overwrites the object if it already exists at the specified index; otherwise, a new object is created and added to the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 从集合中移除具有指定键的 对象。

span.span: Removes the object with the specified key from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的元素在更高级的配置文件中定义的此方法将插入`remove`元素插入当前应用程序级别的配置文件的相应节。If the specified element is defined in a higher-level configuration file, this method inserts a `remove` element into the appropriate section of the configuration file at the level of the current application. 如果该元素定义在当前的配置文件中，从配置文件中移除其项。If the element is defined in the current configuration file, its entry is removed from the configuration file. 要移除的对象必须存在于集合;如果不是，请引发。The object to remove must exist in the collection; if it does not, a is thrown. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
